1.name: Captain America: The First Avenger
1.description: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a "Super-Soldier serum". But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a war monger and a terrorist organization.

2.name: Zookeeper
2.description: A group of zoo animals decide to break their code of silence in order to help their lovable zookeeper find love, without opting to leave his current job for something more illustrious.

3.name: X: First Class
3.description: In the 1960s, superpowered humans Charles Xavier and Erik Lensherr work together to find others like them, but Erik's vengeful pursuit of an ambitious mutant who ruined his life causes a schism to divide them.

4.name: Just Go with It
4.description: On a weekend trip to Hawaii, a plastic surgeon convinces his loyal assistant to pose as his soon-to-be-divorced wife in order to cover up a careless lie he told to his much-younger girlfriend.

5.name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
5.description: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

6.name: Bridesmaids
6.description: Competition between the maid of honor and a bridesmaid, over who is the bride's best friend, threatens to upend the life of an out-of-work pastry chef.

7.name: Thor
7.description: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.

8.name: No Strings Attached
8.description: A guy and girl try to keep their relationship strictly physical, but it's not long before they learn that they want something more.

9.name: The Help
9.description: An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African American maids' point of view on the white families for which they work, and the hardships they go through on a daily basis.

10.name: The Cabin in the Woods
10.description: Five friends go for a break at a remote cabin, where they get more than they bargained for, discovering the truth behind the cabin in the woods.

11.name: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
11.description: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for forty years by Lisbeth Salander, a young computer hacker.

12.name: Drive
12.description: A mysterious Hollywood stuntman and mechanic moonlights as a getaway driver and finds himself in trouble when he helps out his neighbor.

13.name: The Intouchables
13.description: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

14.name: Sucker Punch
14.description: A young girl is institutionalized by her abusive stepfather, retreating to an alternative reality as a coping strategy, envisioning a plan to help her escape.

15.name: Limitless
15.description: With the help of a mysterious pill that enables the user to access one hundred percent of his brain abilities, a struggling writer becomes a financial wizard, but it also puts him in a new world with lots of dangers.

16.name: Midnight in Paris
16.description: While on a trip to Paris with his fiancée's family, a nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s everyday at midnight.

17.name: Super 8
17.description: During the summer of 1979, a group of friends witness a train crash and investigate subsequent unexplained events in their small town.

18.name: Crazy, Stupid, Love.
18.description: A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a newfound friend, Jacob, learning to pick up girls at bars.

19.name: Straw Dogs
19.description: Los Angeles screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. There, while tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals becomes a threat to them both.

20.name: The Hangover Part II
20.description: Two years after the bachelor party in Las Vegas, Phil, Stu, Alan, and Doug jet to Thailand for Stu's wedding. Stu's plan for a subdued pre-wedding brunch, however, goes seriously awry.

21.description: Inspired by a true story, a comedy centered on a 27-year-old guy who learns of his cancer diagnosis and his subsequent struggle to beat the disease.

22.name: Source Code
22.description: A soldier wakes up in someone else's body and discovers he's part of an experimental government program to find the bomber of a commuter train. A mission he has only 8 minutes to complete.

23.name: Cowboys & Aliens
23.description: A spaceship arrives in Arizona, 1873, to take over the Earth, starting with the Wild West region. A posse of cowboys and natives are all that stand in their way.

24.name: Hall Pass
24.description: Rick and Fred, two husbands who are having difficulty in their marriages, are given a Hall Pass by their wives: for one week, they can do whatever they want.

25.name: Moneyball
25.description: Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.

26.name: In Time
26.description: In a future where people stop aging at 25, but are engineered to live only one more year, having the means to buy your way out of the situation is a shot at immortal youth. Here, Will Salas finds himself accused of murder and on the run with a hostage - a connection that becomes an important part of the way against the system.

27.name: Take Me Home Tonight
27.description: Four years after graduation, an awkward high school genius uses his sister's boyfriend's Labor Day party as the perfect opportunity to make his move on his high school crush.

28.name: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
28.description: Detective Sherlock Holmes is on the trail of criminal mastermind Professor Moriarty, who is carrying out a string of random crimes across Europe.

29.name: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
29.description: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

30.name: Warrior
30.description: The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision course with his estranged, older brother.

31.name: Green Lantern
31.description: Reckless test pilot Hal Jordan is granted an alien ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers that inducts him into an intergalactic police force, the Green Lantern Corps.

32.name: Immortals
32.description: Theseus (Henry Cavill) is a mortal man chosen by Zeus (Luke Evans) to lead the fight against the ruthless King Hyperion (Mickey Rourke), who is on a rampage across Greece to obtain a weapon that can destroy humanity.

33.name: Rango
33.description: Rango is an ordinary chameleon who accidentally winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in desperate need of a new sheriff.

34.name: Real Steel
34.description: In the near future, robot boxing is a top sport. A struggling promoter feels he's found a champion in a discarded robot.

35.name: Horrible Bosses
35.description: Three friends conspire to murder their awful bosses when they realize they are standing in the way of their happiness.

36.name: Footloose
36.description: City teenager Ren MacCormack moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.

37.name: Serbuan Maut
37.description: A S.W.A.T. team becomes trapped in a tenement run by a ruthless mobster and his army of killers and thugs.

38.name: The Three Musketeers
38.description: The hot-headed young D'Artagnan along with three former legendary but now down on their luck Musketeers must unite and defeat a beautiful double agent and her villainous employer from seizing the French throne and engulfing Europe in war.

39.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
39.description: Jack Sparrow and Barbossa embark on a quest to find the elusive fountain of youth, only to discover that Blackbeard and his daughter are after it too.

40.name: Hanna
40.description: A sixteen-year-old girl who was raised by her father to be the perfect assassin is dispatched on a mission across Europe, tracked by a ruthless intelligence agent and her operatives.

41.name: Fast Five
41.description: Dominic Toretto and his crew of street racers plan a massive heist to buy their freedom while in the sights of a powerful Brazilian drug lord and a dangerous federal agent.

42.name: Sleeping Beauty
42.description: A haunting portrait of Lucy, a young university student drawn into a mysterious hidden world of unspoken desires.

43.name: Shame
43.description: A sex addict's carefully cultivated private life falls apart after his sister arrives for an indefinite stay.

44.name: Friends with Benefits
44.description: A young man and woman decide to take their friendship to the next level without becoming a couple, but soon discover that adding sex only leads to complications.

45.name: Colombiana
45.description: A young woman, after witnessing her parents' murder as a child in Bogota, grows up to be a stone-cold assassin.

46.name: The Mechanic
46.description: Follows an elite hit man as he teaches his trade to an apprentice who has a connection to one of his previous victims.

47.name: Soul Surfer
47.description: Teenage surfer Bethany Hamilton overcomes the odds and her own fears of returning to the water after losing her left arm in a shark attack.

48.name: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy
48.description: In the bleak days of the Cold War, espionage veteran George Smiley (Gary Oldman) is forced from semi-retirement to uncover a Soviet Agent within MI6.

49.name: Hugo
49.description: In Paris in 1931, an orphan named Hugo Cabret, who lives in the walls of a train station, is wrapped up in a mystery involving his late father and an automaton.

50.name: Scream 4
50.description: Ten years have passed, and Sidney Prescott, who has put herself back together thanks in part to her writing, is visited by the Ghostface Killer.
